SYSTEM: You are a BehaviorTree.CPP code generator.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Output ONLY one BT.CPP XML tree (no prose, no comments, no markdown).
- Format: <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree"> ... </BehaviorTree>
- Close all tags. Use readable node names and ports only when meaningful.

INSTRUCTION: The task requires pushing a T-shaped block (gray) to a fixed target (green) with a circular end-effector (blue). Both observation and control frequencies are 10Hz.

Return only the XML.

<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
  <Sequence>
    <ScanForTarget target="t_block" pattern="raster" max_attempts="3" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <DetectObject target="t_block" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <DetectObject target="t_target" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <MoveAbove target="t_block" offset_z="0.02" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <SetTCPYaw yaw_deg="90"/>
    <ApproachAndAlign target="t_block" tolerance="0.005" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Repeat num_cycles="3">
      <Push target="t_block" distance="0.1" direction_deg="180" timeout_ms="800"/>
    </Repeat>
    <Retreat distance="0.1" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <Wait timeout_ms="500"/>
  </Sequence>
</BehaviorTree>

SYSTEM: You are a BehaviorTree.CPP code generator.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Output ONLY one BT.CPP XML tree (no prose, no comments, no markdown).
- Format: <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree"> ... </BehaviorTree>
- Close all tags. Use readable node names and ports only when meaningful.

INSTRUCTION: The task requires pushing a T-shaped block (gray) to a fixed target (green) with a circular end-effector (blue). Both observation and control frequencies are 10Hz.

Return only the XML.

<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
  <Sequence>
    <RetryUntilSuccessful num_attempts="3">
      <Action ID="DetectObject" target="t_block" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    </RetryUntilSuccessful>
    <RetryUntilSuccessful num_attempts="3">
      <Action ID="DetectObject" target="target_zone" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    </RetryUntilSuccessful>
    <Action ID="MoveAbove" target="t_block" offset_z="0.05" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Action ID="ApproachAndAlign" target="t_block" tolerance="0.005" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Action ID="SetTCPYaw" yaw_deg="180"/>
    <Repeat num_cycles="2">
      <Action ID="Push" target="t_block" distance="0.2" direction_deg="180" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    </Repeat>
    <Condition ID="IsAt" target="target_zone"/>
    <Action ID="Retreat" distance="0.1" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <Action ID="Wait" timeout_ms="400"/>
  </Sequence>
</BehaviorTree>

SYSTEM: You are a BehaviorTree.CPP code generator.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Output ONLY one BT.CPP XML tree (no prose, no comments, no markdown).
- Format: <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree"> ... </BehaviorTree>
- Close all tags. Use readable node names and ports only when meaningful.

INSTRUCTION: picking a grape

Return only the XML.

<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
  <Sequence>
    <Fallback>
      <Condition ID="IsObjectVisible" target="grape_bunch"/>
      <Action ID="DetectObject" target="grape_bunch" timeout_ms="800"/>
    </Fallback>
    <Action ID="MoveAbove" target="grape_bunch" offset_z="0.05" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Action ID="ComputeGraspPose" target="grape" strategy="pinch" result_key="grasp_grape"/>
    <Action ID="OpenGripper" width="0.06" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <Action ID="ApproachAndAlign" target="grape_bunch" tolerance="0.005" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Action ID="Pick" grasp_key="grasp_grape" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Condition ID="IsGraspStable"/>
    <Action ID="MoveTo" target="plate_prepose" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <Action ID="MoveAbove" target="plate" offset_z="0.05" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Action ID="LowerUntilContact" speed="slow" max_depth="0.05" force_threshold="10" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Action ID="OpenGripper" width="0.08" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <Action ID="Retreat" distance="0.1" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Action ID="Wait" timeout_ms="400"/>
  </Sequence>
</BehaviorTree>

SYSTEM: You are a BehaviorTree.CPP code generator.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Output ONLY one BT.CPP XML tree (no prose, no comments, no markdown).
- Format: <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree"> ... </BehaviorTree>
- Close all tags. Use readable node names and ports only when meaningful.

INSTRUCTION: lift up a lid from the pot

Return only the XML.

<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
  <Sequence>
    <OpenGripper width="0.09" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <ScanForTarget target="lid" pattern="arc" max_attempts="3" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <DetectObject target="lid" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <ComputeGraspPose target="lid" strategy="top" result_key="lid_grasp"/>
    <ApproachAndAlign target="lid" tolerance="0.005" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <Pick grasp_key="lid_grasp" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <IsGraspStable/>
    <Retreat distance="0.1" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <ContainerOpen target="pot"/>
  </Sequence>
</BehaviorTree>

SYSTEM: You are a BehaviorTree.CPP code generator.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Output ONLY one BT.CPP XML tree (no prose, no comments, no markdown).
- Format: <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree"> ... </BehaviorTree>
- Close all tags. Use readable node names and ports only when meaningful.

INSTRUCTION: opening the fridge

Return only the XML.

<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
  <Sequence>
    <Action ID="DetectObject" target="fridge_door" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Action ID="DetectObject" target="fridge_handle" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Condition ID="IsObjectVisible" target="fridge_handle"/>
    <Action ID="ApproachAndAlign" target="fridge_handle" tolerance="0.01" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <Action ID="OpenGripper" width="0.09" timeout_ms="500"/>
    <Action ID="CloseGripper" force="20" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <Action ID="OpenContainer" target="fridge_door" container_type="hinged_door" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <Condition ID="ContainerOpen" target="fridge_door"/>
    <Action ID="Retreat" distance="0.2" timeout_ms="1200"/>
  </Sequence>
</BehaviorTree>

SYSTEM: You are a BehaviorTree.CPP code generator.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Output ONLY one BT.CPP XML tree (no prose, no comments, no markdown).
- Format: <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree"> ... </BehaviorTree>
- Close all tags. Use readable node names and ports only when meaningful.

INSTRUCTION: open drawer

Return only the XML.

<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
  <Sequence>
    <RetryUntilSuccessful num_attempts="3">
      <Action ID="DetectObject" target="drawer_handle" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    </RetryUntilSuccessful>
    <Action ID="OpenGripper" width="0.09" timeout_ms="400"/>
    <Action ID="MoveTo" target="drawer_handle_pregrasp" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <Action ID="ApproachAndAlign" target="drawer_handle" tolerance="0.005" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <Action ID="CloseGripper" force="20" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <Action ID="OpenContainer" target="drawer_A" container_type="drawer" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <Action ID="Retreat" distance="0.1" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <Action ID="OpenGripper" width="0.08" timeout_ms="400"/>
  </Sequence>
</BehaviorTree>

SYSTEM: You are a BehaviorTree.CPP code generator.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Output ONLY one BT.CPP XML tree (no prose, no comments, no markdown).
- Format: <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree"> ... </BehaviorTree>
- Close all tags. Use readable node names and ports only when meaningful.

INSTRUCTION: picking a bread

Return only the XML.

<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
  <Sequence>
    <DetectObject target="bread" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <OpenGripper width="0.09" timeout_ms="400"/>
    <MoveAbove target="bread" offset_z="0.02" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <ApproachAndAlign target="bread" tolerance="0.005" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <LowerUntilContact speed="slow" max_depth="0.03" force_threshold="5.0" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <CloseGripper force="20" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <IsGraspStable/>
    <Retreat distance="0.1" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <MoveAbove target="plate" offset_z="0.03" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <PlaceAt pose_key="plate_center" yaw_deg="0" press_force="10.0" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <OpenGripper width="0.08" timeout_ms="500"/>
    <Retreat distance="0.1" timeout_ms="800"/>
  </Sequence>
</BehaviorTree>

SYSTEM: You are a BehaviorTree.CPP code generator.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Output ONLY one BT.CPP XML tree (no prose, no comments, no markdown).
- Format: <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree"> ... </BehaviorTree>
- Close all tags. Use readable node names and ports only when meaningful.

INSTRUCTION: picking a bread

Return only the XML.

<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
  <Sequence>
    <OpenGripper width="0.09" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <Fallback>
      <IsObjectVisible target="bread"/>
      <RetryUntilSuccessful num_attempts="3">
        <DetectObject target="bread" timeout_ms="1200"/>
      </RetryUntilSuccessful>
    </Fallback>
    <MoveAbove target="bread" offset_z="0.05" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <ApproachAndAlign target="bread" tolerance="0.01" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <SetTCPYaw yaw_deg="90"/>
    <ComputeGraspPose target="bread" strategy="pinch" result_key="bread_grasp"/>
    <LowerUntilContact speed="slow" max_depth="0.02" force_threshold="10" timeout_ms="1200"/>
    <CloseGripper force="10" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <IsGraspStable/>
    <Retreat distance="0.1" timeout_ms="800"/>
  </Sequence>
</BehaviorTree>
